import './game.css' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function Game() { let navigate = useNavigate() const handleNormalClick = () => { console.log('aaaaaaa') navigate('/game/normal') } const handleHardClick = () => { navigate('/game/hard') } // Got these words from ChatGPT const normalWords = [ 'NUMBER', 'PEOPLE', 'BEFORE', 'LETTER', 'LITTLE', 'YELLOW', 'WINDOW', 'BOTTLE', 'BUTTON', 'BATTLE', ] const hardWords = [ 'abalone', 'bandana', 'chicken', 'dolphin', 'eclipse', 'furnace', 'gazelle', 'haddock', 'inquiry', 'javelin', ] const answerWord = props.mode === 'normal' ? normalWords[Math.floor(Math.random() * normalWords.length)] : hardWords[Math.floor(Math.random() * hardWords.length)] return (

Game Mode Select

) } export default Game
